title: Untold Until Now: The Sex Trafficking of Young Women from Russia to South America
description:
Acclaimed author Talia Carner shares the research and findings behind her book, "The Third Daughter", revealing the little known truth of late 19th century sex trafficking of girls from Russia to South America.

Follow Frank’s Guest:
Talia Carner
https://twitter.com/authortalia
https://www.taliacarner.com/

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
